children.description: Then the response status code should be 200
And I validate the response with a JSON Schema "getBookingsIds"
And the response should contain a list of booking IDs

userStory.storyName: Search Bookings by Checkin and Checkout Dates
userStory.displayName: Search Bookings by Checkin and Checkout Dates

title: Search bookings with valid checkin and checkout dates

dataTable.scenarioOutline:
When a GET request is made to search bookings with the following criteria "<checkin>" and "<checkout>"
Then the response status code should be 200
And I validate the response with a JSON Schema "getBookingsIds"
And the response should contain a list of booking IDs

scenarioOutline:
When a GET request is made to search bookings with the following criteria "<checkin>" and "<checkout>"
Then the response status code should be 200
And I validate the response with a JSON Schema "getBookingsIds"
And the response should contain a list of booking IDs
